comment:
* A listener to be invoked when NFC controller always on state changes. *

Register your {@code ControllerAlwaysOnListener} implementation with {@link * NfcAdapter#registerWlcStateListener} and disable it with {@link * NfcAdapter#unregisterWlcStateListenerListener}. * @see #registerWlcStateListener * @hide

methods.name: void onWlcStateChanged(@NonNull WlcListenerDeviceInfo wlcListenerDeviceInfo)
methods.comment: * Called on NFC WLC state changes
